            “I hope so.”
            “No hoping, we will just do it.” — The Kominsky
            Method S2E5
            
            
            About me
            Hello and 你好！Thanks for visiting my page!
            My name is Liuyi Pan and I am currently studying at
            University of Toronto as a senior student specializing in
            Mathematics and its applications in Probability and
            Statistics. In my spare time, I love photography.
            Two Truths and a Lie
            
            I love cilantro.
            
            I’ve never been to New York City.
            
            I played the clarinet during elementary school.
